story.name: ANDYSMANCLUB Join the Brew Train!
story.content: {"_uid":"4b33c7a1-d80b-4974-954a-bc00187a77e1","body":[{"_uid":"38804567-ec6a-48b8-9555-2aedce496910","title":"","content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"AMC JOIN THE BREW TRAIN!","type":"text"},{"type":"hard_break"},{"type":"hard_break"},{"text":"The Samaritans aim to turn ‘Blue Monday’, commonly believed to be the most difficult day of the year, into ‘Brew Monday’, with its positive associations of a cheery cuppa and a convivial chat. Initiatives such as the Brew Train are encouraging people to get together for that char-and-chinwag this month, whilst raising awareness of how those who might be struggling at this time of year can find support.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"British Transport Police (BTP) and dedicated suicide prevention charities Andy’s Man Club and The Jordan Legacy also took part in the on-board activities.","type":"text"},{"type":"hard_break"},{"type":"hard_break"},{"text":"Click here to find out more!","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.mynewsdesk.com/uk/govia-thameslink-railway/pressreleases/boro-academy-players-share-cheery-char-on-thameslinks-brew-monday-special-3297373","uuid":null,"anchor":null,"target":"_self","linktype":"url"}}]}]}]},"component":"centered","background_color":"bg-white"},{"_uid":"5d49be26-d33c-4793-b079-81260bc33916","items":["8eb38a6f-7a5c-43a8-b283-6a736e47e4e9","259dd1d5-d3e8-46fe-8936-622dd318b408","eb5b3dfe-3d35-4df2-b860-01af0170a9df"],"component":"three-column-cards","custom_label":"","custom_title":"","background_color":"bg-white"}],"meta":{"_uid":"7cb37fd6-b557-42a6-af46-ca7c6e324537","title":"ANDYSMANCLUB Join the Brew Train","plugin":"meta-fields","description":"Andys Man Club joined the Samaritans Brew Train - aiming to change the narrative around Blue Monday and promote positive mental health."},"component":"news_views","description":"","featured_image":{"id":13772036,"alt":"","name":"","focus":"","title":"","source":"","filename":"https://a.storyblok.com/f/153326/2048x1354/de6b6c0435/2d8d5721-4dde-467c-8ddb-237792d4c3de.jpeg","copyright":"","fieldtype":"asset","meta_data":{},"is_private":"","is_external_url":false}}

story.name: ANDYSMANCLUB Join the Brew Train!
story.content: {"_uid":"4b33c7a1-d80b-4974-954a-bc00187a77e1","body":[{"_uid":"38804567-ec6a-48b8-9555-2aedce496910","title":"","content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"AMC JOIN THE BREW TRAIN!","type":"text"},{"type":"hard_break"},{"type":"hard_break"},{"text":"The Samaritans aim to turn ‘Blue Monday’, commonly believed to be the most difficult day of the year, into ‘Brew Monday’, with its positive associations of a cheery cuppa and a convivial chat. Initiatives such as the Brew Train are encouraging people to get together for that char-and-chinwag this month, whilst raising awareness of how those who might be struggling at this time of year can find support.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"British Transport Police (BTP) and dedicated suicide prevention charities Andy’s Man Club and The Jordan Legacy also took part in the on-board activities.","type":"text"},{"type":"hard_break"},{"type":"hard_break"},{"text":"Click here to find out more!","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.mynewsdesk.com/uk/govia-thameslink-railway/pressreleases/boro-academy-players-share-cheery-char-on-thameslinks-brew-monday-special-3297373","uuid":null,"anchor":null,"target":"_self","linktype":"url"}}]}]}]},"component":"centered","background_color":"bg-white"},{"_uid":"5d49be26-d33c-4793-b079-81260bc33916","items":["8eb38a6f-7a5c-43a8-b283-6a736e47e4e9","259dd1d5-d3e8-46fe-8936-622dd318b408","eb5b3dfe-3d35-4df2-b860-01af0170a9df"],"component":"three-column-cards","custom_label":"","custom_title":"","background_color":"bg-white"}],"meta":{"_uid":"7cb37fd6-b557-42a6-af46-ca7c6e324537","title":"ANDYSMANCLUB Join the Brew Train","plugin":"meta-fields","description":"Andys Man Club joined the Samaritans Brew Train - aiming to change the narrative around Blue Monday and promote positive mental health."},"component":"news_views","description":"","featured_image":{"id":13772036,"alt":"","name":"","focus":"","title":"","source":"","filename":"https://a.storyblok.com/f/153326/2048x1354/de6b6c0435/2d8d5721-4dde-467c-8ddb-237792d4c3de.jpeg","copyright":"","fieldtype":"asset","meta_data":{},"is_private":"","is_external_url":false}}
